description: AI explanation system in permanent fallback mode, providing static instead of dynamic explanations. Quality degraded.
commonCauses: Model loading failed and not retried
Fallback flag not reset after issue resolved
License tier doesn't include AI features
solutions: Implement periodic retry for model loading
Reset fallback state after app restart
Check device compatibility before permanent fallback
Provide user control to retry AI initialization
Clear fallback flag when conditions improve
Implement smart retry with exponential backoff
Notify user about fallback mode with recovery options
prevention: Don't permanently disable AI after single failure
Implement health check to exit fallback mode
Monitor fallback mode usage in analytics
Provide manual AI re-enable option in settings
